title: Name Reset
message: Your username has been changed due to community guide violation - to request a new user name please submit a support ticket with 3 options and this user name "BarryMcC"

title: Doxxing Rule Violation
message: We take doxxing or threats of doxxing extremely seriously. After investigation we found that you released personal information about the location of another player. We have issued a 10 day chat mute in regards to this. Further violations of this rule will result in a permanent ban from the game.
